name: Fortune Teller
description:
This is just a fun little toy that generates strings.  You can get a new fortune based around your birthday every day, or just generate a random one to laugh at the stupid jokes that get generated.

Also, if you think the fortune teller himself is fun to look at, try right-clicking.

I made this in late 2013.  I have made a couple small changes (I removed a buggy fullscreen button and lowered the game's resolution) but it is  presented here mostly as it was on its original release.

Want to support my free games?  I sell merchandise featuring characters and designs from some of my most well received games. Every purchase helps me to not starve on my way to releasing my next game!
